name: Tales From the TerrorVortex
description:
Tales From the TerrorVortex is a 2d shooter arcade style game created by me as part of the MSU Game Design and Development Course. Major differences from tutorial:

3 distinct levels, tied together in a "story" mode, complete with "Cutscenes";

Redesigned UI (Level Selector, Changelog, Credits, New in-game menu)

Destructible environment;

Boss fight! Boss Fight! Boss Fight!

Endless mode level;
